section.title: Citrix Workspace
section.para: The Citrix Workspace App is a remote desktop viewer which provides access to XenDesktop installations.

section.title: Basic usage
section.para: The tarball archive needs to be downloaded manually as the license agreements of the vendor for Citrix Workspace needs to be accepted first. Then run nix-prefetch-url file://$PWD/linuxx64-$version.tar.gz. With the archive available in the store the package can be built and installed with Nix.
